title: Global papaya production 2000 to 2017
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Million metric tons. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
Overall Million metric tons has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2000 and 2001.
Maximum Million metric tons, about 13.05 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Million metric tons about 7.25 was reached at Year 2000
